author: zhen
msg: Added support for %rawurl% for the configuration of proxyUrl.

Containers can now set proxyUrl to "http://host/gadgets/proxy//%rawurl%" or "http://host/gadgets/proxy/refresh=%refresh%/%rawurl%" to take advantage of the newly introduced chained proxy request syntax.

author: lu4242
msg: allow converter and validator property hierarchy
